v.
Tim BARKELL; Bill Sather; Steve Barclay ; Malissa Rasaakka; M.R., Minor Child; and Anaconda-Deer Lodge County, Respondents and Appellees. DA 17-0472 Supreme Court of Montana. Submitted on Briefs: February 28, 2018
